Subjects: Edward IV, when earl of March; historical poems; chronicles, verse in
_description: A couplet in Gregory’s Chronicle on the approach of the Earl of March (‘thys fayre whyte ros and herbe’) to London, A.D. 1461

BLEge1995.Transcription: he that had Londyn for sakewolde nomore to hem take
